title: Beta.Day1.Morning.Start
body:
Hey
You had a training session? We did't get one of those.
They just pointed at a bunch of those blue rocks and told us if we don't bring enough up they won't let us out of the cave
I'm not sure what to do, do you?
[[Just follow me|Beta.Day1.Morning.Start.Yes]]
[[No not really|Beta.Day1.Morning.Start.No]]
[[I'm just doing what they tell me|Beta.Day1.Morning.Start.Maybe]]

title: Beta.Day1.Evening.Start
body:
Made it through my first day. it starts over again tomorrow
I think I can get the hang of this
How long do they expect us to survive anyway?
<<if $escape_active == 1>>
[[I'm trying to escape, wanna join in?|Beta.EscapeOption]]
<<endif>>
[[Nevermind|Beta.EndDialog]]

title: Beta.Day2.Morning.Start
body:
I couldn't sleep well, could you?
[[I can't get used to this place|Beta.Day2.Morning.Start.Yes]]
[[I guess I slept alright|Beta.Day2.Morning.Start.No]]
[[I had some strange dreams|Beta.Day2.Morning.Start.Maybe]]

title: Beta.Day2.Evening.Start
body:
Are they gonna feed us any more than they are?
How do they expect us to get their fucking rocks if we're hungry all the time
<<if $escape_active == 1>>
[[I'm trying to escape, wanna join in?|Beta.EscapeOption]]
<<endif>>
[[Nevermind|Beta.EndDialog]]

title: Beta.Day3.Morning.Start
body:
I don't think I've had a dream since I got here
I think I'm too tired at the end of the day to dream
This place, is like a nightmare
<<if $escape_active == 1>>
[[I'm trying to escape, wanna join in?|Beta.EscapeOption]]
<<endif>>
[[Nevermind|Beta.EndDialog]]

title: Beta.Day3.Evening.Start
body:
Night must fall when we're underground
I seem to only see the sun in the morning
I wonder how bad it's going to be in winter, will we even see the sun?
<<if $escape_active == 1>>
[[I'm trying to escape, wanna join in?|Beta.EscapeOption]]
<<endif>>
[[Nevermind|Beta.EndDialog]]

title: Beta.Day1.Morning.Start.Yes
body:
You're the channeler right? Yeah I figured.
They told us you're supposed to be able to "see" the stones somehow
[[Beta.Day1.Morning.Start2]]

title: Beta.Day1.Morning.Start.No
body:
No earthly idea, huh
I suppose it's really their fault if we can't do our job
[[Beta.Day1.Morning.Start2]]

title: Beta.Day1.Morning.Start.Maybe
body:
Well yeah, they're the ones pointing guns at us all the time
[[Beta.Day1.Morning.Start2]]

title: Beta.Day2.Morning.Start.Yes
body:
Yeah, A place like this, it just feels cursed
[[Beta.Day2.Morning.Start2]]

title: Beta.Day2.Morning.Start.Maybe
body:
Someone told me channelers tend to get weird dreams
I can't even begin to imagine what they must be like
[[Beta.Day2.Morning.Start2]]

title: Beta.Day2.Morning.Start2
body:
Alright, I guess we should, uh
Mine these fucking rocks

title: Beta.EscapeOption
body:
<<addNPCToEscape CampAreaSecretEscape Beta>>
You want me to join your little escape plan? sure
